getProxyId().details: Gets the proxy id associated with the proxy address.

params.index: Index of target in authorities array.

transferFrom(bytes,address,address,uint2.details: Transfers batch of ERC1155 assets. Either succeeds or throws.

params.amount: Amount that will be multiplied with each element of `assetData.values` to scale the        values that will be transferred.
params.assetData: Byte array encoded with ERC1155 token address, array of ids, array of values, and callback data.
